Desc.entry: Voluntary group working closely with Sheffield City Council and Sheffield Wildlife Trust to improve the environment of the park. Also conducts guided walks/talks throughout the year and is involved in practical conservation tasks. Also involved in the Norfolk Heritage Trust. Works with various other bodies to help organise the Sheffield Fayre and new members always welcome to keep this a free and sustainable event. Also welcomes new members to help keep the park one of the most interesting parks to visit in terms of playground facilities and the caf√©.

Pubs.entry: Newsletter; Leaflets; Postcards; Norfolk Heritage Park tour leaflet

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Induction loop only in Community hall, level floor access throughout, Braille signage, car parking, free hire of mobility scooter - book in advance on Tel 286 0400

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: 1st Tues morning in the month, Mon evening meeting (quarterly)
